Player 's Handbook

A constant hum of busy activity pervades the warren and neighborhood where gnome form their close-knit community. Louder sound punctuate the hum: a crunch of grind gear here, a minor explosion there, a yelp of surprise or triumph, and especially burst of laughter. Gnomes take delight in life, enjoy every moment of invention, exploration, investigation, creation, and play.
Ability Score Increase. Your Intelligence score increase by 2.

Age. Gnomes mature at the same rate a human, and most be expect to settle into adult life around the age of 40. They can live to 350 year on average, but it 's not too uncommon for them to reach 500 year of age.

Alignment. Gnomes be generally Good. Those who tend towards Law be sage, engineer, researcher, scholar, investigator, or inventor. Those who tend towards Chaos be often minstrel, trickster, wanderer, or fanciful jeweler. Gnomes be light-hearted, and even the trickster amongst them favor harmless prank over vicious scheme.
Size. Gnomes be between 3 and 4 foot tall and weigh around 40 pound. Your size be Small.
Speed. Your base walk speed be 25 foot.

Darkvision. Accustomed to life underground, you have superior vision in dark and dim condition. You can see in dim light within 60 foot of you a if it be bright light, and in darkness a if it be dim light. You ca n't discern color in darkness, only shade of gray.
Gnome Cunning. You have advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma save against magic.
Languages. You can read, speak, and write Common and Gnomish.
Forest

As a forest gnome, you have a natural knack for illusion and inherent quickness and stealth. In the world of D& D, forest gnome be rare and secretive. They gather in hidden community in sylvan forest, use illusion and trickery to conceal themselves from threat or to mask their escape should they be detect. Forest gnome tend to be friendly with other good-spirited woodland folk, and they regard elf and good fey a their most important ally. These gnome also befriend small forest animal and rely on them for information about threat that might prowl their land.
Ability Score Increase. Your Dexterity score increase by 1.
Natural Illusionist. You know the Minor Illusion cantrip. Intelligence be your spellcasting modifier for it.
Speak with Small Beasts. Through sound and gesture, you may communicate simple idea with Small or small beast.
Rock
As a rock gnome, you have a natural inventiveness and hardiness beyond that of other gnome. Most gnome in the world of D& D be rock gnome, include the tinker gnome of the Dragonlance set.
Ability Score Increase. Your Constitution score increase by 1.

Artificer 's Lore. Whenever you make an Intelligence( History) check related to magical, alchemical, or technological item, you can add twice your proficiency bonus instead of any other proficiency bonus that may apply.

Tinker. You have proficiency with artisan tool( tinker 's tool). Using those tool, you can spend 1 hour and 10 gp worth of material to construct a Tiny clockwork device( AC 5, 1 hp). The device cease to function after 24 hour( unless you spend 1 hour repair it to keep the device function), or when you use your action to dismantle it; at that time, you can reclaim the material use to create it. You can have up to three such device active at a time. When you create a device, choose one of the follow option: Clockwork Toy. This toy be a clockwork animal, monster, or person, such a a frog, mouse, bird, dragon, or soldier. When place on the ground, the toy move 5 foot across the ground on each of your turn in a random direction. It make noise a appropriate to the creature it represent. Fire Starter. The device produce a miniature flame, which you can use to light a candle, torch, or campfire. Using the device require your action. Music Box. When open, this music box play a single song at a moderate volume. The box stop play when it reach the song 's end or when it be close. At your DM 's discretion, you may make other object with effect similar in power to these. The Prestidigitation cantrip be a good baseline for such effect.
